sn5.6:1.2: The eldest of three sisters whose verses are recorded respectively: Cālā at SN 5.6 and Thig 7.2; Upacālā at SN 5.7 and Thig 7.3; Sīsupacālā at SN 5.8 and Thig 8.1. There is considerable confusion, as verses ascribed to one sister in SN are attributed to another in the Therīgāthā. The three sisters were taught meditation by Revata (Thag 1.42).
